tree.name: Egor Demin
tree.note: BYU guard, drafted with BKN's own pick reacquired from Houston

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 BKN 1st Round Pick (#8)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Nets reacquired their own 2025 1st (negating swap) and 2026 1st from Rockets by trading PHX 2027 1st, PHX 2025 swap rights, and 2029 assets

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 PHX 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Phoenix in Kevin Durant trade. One of four 1st-round picks BKN received for KD.

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Durant
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Sign-and-trade: Nets sent D'Angelo Russell, Treveon Graham, and Shabazz Napier to Warriors for Kevin Durant and a protected 2020 1st round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: D'Angelo Russell
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Nets traded Brook Lopez and the 27th pick (Kyle Kuzma) to Lakers for D'Angelo Russell and Timofey Mozgov

assetsGivenUp.name: Brook Lopez
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 10th overall by Brooklyn (then New Jersey Nets) in 2008 NBA Draft
